圏

Значения

Сфера, предел; документ, круг, сфера

Мнемоника

Круглый футляр 囗 со свитком 巻 внутри.

Варианты

rtega_mnemonic:
圈圈RS
圏圏		circle, corral, radius
  • enclosure 囗 around a precious scroll 卷
heisig_constituent: sphere, pent in, scroll, quarter, snake, self
heisig_story: This key word refers to a realm or orbit, not to a ball. Its elements: pent in . . . scroll.
koohiiStory1: I assosiate scrolls with spell casting, the efect of this spell is pent in a certain sphere of influence, outside it no damage is done.
koohiiStory2: [RPG] You´re fighting a powerful enemy. Your mage uses a scroll/quartersnake of protection, and he´s pent in a sphere of protection.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Your mouth contains a scroll, which you pull out and look at. On the scroll is a map, showing the range of the sphere of your mouth.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: On the map, there is a circle drawn around your mouth showing what range your mouth exists in. Thankfully, your tongue and teeth are within that sphere.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Looking at the range of your mouth on the map, you notice a tiny samurai marked near your molars. It is Ken (けん) the samurai.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Everything else on the map was accurate, so you take a close look in the mirror, and there he is: a tiny Ken the samurai, protecting the range that is your mouth. He gives you a small nod and goes back to his post.
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 二 (два), 人 (человек), 并, 囗 (коробка), 大 (большой), 已 (уже)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you roll up (巻) into the box (囗) everything in range

Name meaning

quān, juàn, juān
яп. вм. 圈
Radicals: 口, 巻  (mouth, scroll)
Meaning Mnemonic
Your mouth contains a scroll, which you pull out and look at. On the scroll is a map, showing the range of the sphere of your mouth.
On the map, there is a circle drawn around your mouth showing what range your mouth exists in. Thankfully, your tongue and teeth are within that sphere.
Reading Mnemonic
Looking at the range of your mouth on the map, you notice a tiny samurai marked near your molars. It is Ken (けん) the samurai.
Everything else on the map was accurate, so you take a close look in the mirror, and there he is: a tiny Ken the samurai, protecting the range that is your mouth. He gives you a small nod and goes back to his post.
